context: Arm Holdings plc is a semiconductor IP and architecture licensing company focused on processor architecture licensing for mobile, IoT, automotive, and data centers. Essential AI infrastructure IP. Armv9 adoption across devices and data centers.

competitors.name: Intel
competitors.notes: x86 architecture for PCs and servers

competitors.name: AMD
competitors.notes: x86 competitor, also licensing ARM for some products

competitors.name: Qualcomm
competitors.notes: Major ARM licensee, also competitor in some areas
